title: RAR: Add opt-in key to log error instead of warning on failure to resolve

nodes.body:
Example:
```
C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\15.0\Bin\Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets(2110,5): warning MSB3274: The primary reference "atk-sharp, Version=2.12.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=35e10195dab3c99f, processorArchitecture=MSIL" could not be resolved because it was built against the ".NETFramework,Version=v4.6" framework. This is a higher version than the currently targeted framework ".NETFramework,Version=v4.5". [C:\monodevelop\main\external\mono-addins\Mono.Addins.Gui\Mono.Addins.Gui.csproj]
```
